overview: Join SportsCenter hosts Stuart Scott and Linda Cohn for an unprecedented look back at the most memorable moments from the year in sports. Relive the best of the best – and the worst of the worst – from SportsCenter’s nightly Top Ten including:  • Dwyane Wade & Shaquille O’Neal lead the Miami Heat to their first NBA Championship • The Texas Longhorns’ 2006 Rose Bowl victory and BCS Championship • Barry Bonds chases Hank Aaron’s Home Run Record • Tiger Woods’ emotional win at the British Open • Kobe Bryant scores 81 points in a single game • Jerome Bettis goes out on top with the Pittsburgh Steelers’ Super Bowl XL victory • The Saints’ triumphant return to New Orleans • Travis Pastrana’s history making Moto X Double Back Flip • Detroit Tigers vs. St. Louis Cardinals in the 2006 World Series • Andre Agassi’s emotional farewell during the US Open • Italy’s dramatic World Cup victory over France • And much, much more
title: ESPN SportsCenter: Year in Review 2006
